snippet: The talks on Ukraine that are set to begin in Geneva on Thursday are a pivotal test of Russia’s intentions before the United States and European nations decide whether to impose more economic sanctions.
abstract: American officials say high-level talks on Ukraine set to begin in Geneva have emerged as a pivotal test of Russia’s intentions in the region before the United States and European nations decide whether to impose additional economic sanctions on Moscow.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and JAMES KANTER
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Geneva, and James Kanter from Brussels. Alison Smale contributed reporting from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: The talks on Ukraine that are set to begin in Geneva on Thursday are a pivotal test of Russia’s intentions before the United States and European nations decide whether to impose more economic sanctions.

headline.main: Talks a Chance for Russia to Step Back on Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Planned Talks Are Seen as Test of Russia’s Aims
